item.title: Maddie Durdant-Hollamby: Tributes to Kettering murder victim
item.description: Maddie Durdant-Hollamby, 22, was discovered dead at a house where the body of a man was also found.

item.title: Mass rescue of 17 caught in rip current off Bournemouth
item.description: The group were seen by lifeguards being pulled out to sea in a powerful rip current on Monday.

item.title: Major walking 1,200 miles barefoot to fund daughter's treatment
item.description: Major Chris Brannigan has already raised £900,000 for research into his daughter's rare disease.

item.title: Afghanistan: Pen Farthing sorry for foul-mouthed message to aide
item.description: Pen Farthing says he was "at the lowest point" as he tried to get staff and animals out of Afghanistan.

item.title: Cambridgeshire python: Snake's tree rescue 'like a scene from Jungle Book'
item.description: The 10ft-long snake is rescued by firefighters in a village in rural Cambridgeshire.

item.title: Gloucestershire hospitals in £100m upgrade to improve specialist care
item.description: The two-year plan for two Gloucestershire hospitals aims to provide 'the next generation of care'.

item.title: Man dies after assault on Birmingham night out
item.description: The 50-year-old was taken to hospital on Sunday, where he later died, police say.

item.title: Bourton-on-the-Water crowds enjoy river football match
item.description: Several hundred spectators watch the annual football in the river fixture in Bourton-on-the-Water.

item.title: Toddler feared abducted to Spain flown home
item.description: The two-year-old girl had been taken on a flight from Glasgow to Spain by a man and a woman.

item.title: Hatchling: Giant dragon puppet flies off Plymouth coast
item.description: The Hatchling spent the weekend travelling the streets of Plymouth before flying away.

item.title: Paramotor pilot shares pictures of John O'Groats-Land's End flight
item.description: Daniel Jones snaps aerial images from John O'Groats to Land's End while on a very personal mission.

item.title: Feminist Collages London: Tackling violence against women with slogan posters
item.description: A movement that started in Paris, has now spread into locations across the globe.

item.title: Why teenagers are mentoring senior Met Police officers
item.description: Three teenagers have mentored a trio of the Met’s top women officers over the last six months.

item.title: Decades of hoarding made house 'a no-go area'
item.description: A woman who struggled with buying and hoarding "bargains" for 30 years explains how it began.

item.title: Afghanistan events 'raw and emotional' for veterans
item.description: Military veteran Nick Wilson says the current Afghanistan crisis is affecting those who fought there.

item.title: Manchester Pride exhibition to reveal stories of freedom
item.description: The audio recordings and portraits form part of a weekend of cultural events to celebrate Pride.

item.title: Daniel James: Leeds close to signing Manchester United and Wales winger for club record £30m
item.description: Leeds United are closing in on a club record £30m deal to sign Manchester United winger Dan James.

item.title: Tokyo Paralympics: Sarah Storey becomes Great Britain's joint most successful Paralympian with 16th gold
item.description: Sarah Storey becomes Great Britain's joint most successful Paralympian of all time after winning her 16th gold medal in the C5 time trial in Tokyo.

item.title: Tokyo Paralympics: Ben Watson wins time trial gold as medals flow on day seven
item.description: Ben Watson wins time trial gold on his Paralympic debut as the medals continue to flow for Great Britain on day seven in Tokyo.

item.title: Moise Kean: Juventus re-sign Everton striker on loan
item.description: Italy striker Moise Kean returns to Juventus on loan after only two seasons at Everton.
